title: Nanophotonic Structure Reverse Design: Deep Learning-Based Material and Morphology Optimization Methodology in [K-12] Education

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory optical theory, calculus, and basic machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Environment enabling simulation and optimization algorithm practice using digital devices

learning_goals: Construct an optical spectrum prediction model for metasurfaces using deep learning-based reverse engineering methodology
Derive optimal structural parameter combinations under multi-material conditions, including phase-change materials (PCMs) and 2D materials
Solve optimization problems in a composite design space integrating arbitrary polygonal meta-atom geometries and material selection
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
